dialogues.speaker: Commander
dialogues.text: Our mission is to infiltrate enemy lines and take out their command center.

dialogues.speaker: Soldier
dialogues.text: That's suicide, sir. They outnumber us three to one.

dialogues.speaker: Commander
dialogues.text: We must act quickly and reliably with the element of surprise on our side.

dialogues.speaker: Soldier
dialogues.text: Roger that, sir. We'll do our best.

dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: As the sun sets, the team readies themselves for a challenging mission.
